django.contrib.gis.db.backends.oracle.models
============================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.db.backends.oracle.models

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   The GeometryColumns and SpatialRefSys models for the Oracle spatial
   backend.

   It should be noted that Oracle Spatial does not have database tables
   named according to the OGC standard, so the closest analogs are used.
   For example, the `USER_SDO_GEOM_METADATA` is used for the GeometryColumns
   model and the `SDO_COORD_REF_SYS` is used for the SpatialRefSys model.



Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.db.backends.oracle.models.OracleGeometryColumns
   django.contrib.gis.db.backends.oracle.models.OracleSpatialRefSys


Module Contents
---------------

      .. py:attribute:: managed
         :value: False




   .. py:method:: table_name_col()
      :classmethod:


      Return the name of the metadata column used to store the feature table
      name.



   .. py:method:: geom_col_name()
      :classmethod:


      Return the name of the metadata column used to store the feature
      geometry column.
